critique: The document is a simple amendment to a previous executive order, updating a title. There is no strong emotional content. The primary emotion the President might want to elicit is a sense of order and competent governance, but this is very subtle. Initial scores: Joy: 1, Sadness: 1, Anger: 1, Fear: 1, Disgust: 1, Surprise: 1. Revised scores: Joy: 1, Sadness: 1, Anger: 1, Fear: 1, Disgust: 1, Surprise: 1.
